metadata.title: Companies and Corporate Groups - Sttok
metadata.description: Corporate management software for companies and corporate groups. Shareholder Register, Shareholder Meetings, etc.
metadata.keywords: Shareholder Register, Company, corporate group, shareholder meeting, incentive plans, board of directors

hero.title: Solution for Companies and Corporate Groups
hero.description: Digital management of companies for Businesses and Corporate Groups. Automate corporate management.

features.title: Main Features
features.description: Sttok digitizes corporate management for Companies and Corporate Groups, optimizing key tasks such as shareholder register administration, shareholder meetings, board meetings, and incentive plans.

items.title: Shareholder Register
items.description: Manage the shareholder register with always up-to-date and accessible data.

items.title: Incentive Plans
items.description: Automate the creation and management of stock options and other incentive plans.

items.title: Operations Simulator
items.description: Calculate capital increases and investment scenarios with precision.

items.title: Shareholder Meetings
items.description: Convene, vote, and manage shareholder meetings digitally.

items.title: Board of Directors
items.description: Digitally manage Board meetings and voting.

items.title: Corporate Documentation
items.description: Generate and manage minutes, certificates, and other documents automatically.

items.title: Digital Signature
items.description: Integrated digital signature to automatically sign documents.

items.title: Shareholder Access
items.description: You can grant access to investors so they can have corporate documentation and information available.

items.title: Investor Portal
items.description: Sttok offers you the possibility of having the Investor Portal fully integrated into your website
